name: HyperBowl
description: Be the ball! Roll around the original six HyperBowl lanes and some new ones. Enjoy the scenery, but remember to head for the pins! Play 1-4 players in the original Arcade Mode or quick-play in single-player mode.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: 2.6 GHz Intel Core i5 Memory: 8 GB RAM DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space
